column2: This character is known in his realm for being adept at killing tigers.
column3: Ce personnage a connu de tuer les tigres
column4: Der Charakter, obwohl weder Konfuzianer, Amidist oder Taoist, hegt eine besondere Sympatie und Verständnis für daoische Religionen und ihre Jünger.
column6: Este personaje, aunque no es Confuciano, ni Amidista o Taoísta, tiene una especial simpatía y conocimiento de la fe Daoas y sus seguidores.

column2: This character drinks garlic tea, eats garlic salad and luncheons on roasted garlic with honey. Nobody can question this character's dedication to healthy pursuits. The problem is nobody is likely to pursuit due to rancid breath.
